Package Battle.GeneralBattle

Class BombingCombatManager

java.lang.Object
Battle.GeneralBattle.BombingCombatManager
public class BombingCombatManager extends Object
This class manages most of the elements of the battles.

  • Constructor Details

    • BombingCombatManager

      private BombingCombatManager()
      Creates the unique instance of BombingCombatManager and copy the list of Airship from the management part to a list of FightAirship.
      Only one instance of BombingCombatManager needs to be created as it controls the whole battle part. Thus, its access modifier is set to private as we want it to be a singleton.
      This should be changed when integrating with the other parts of the game as we need to create a new instance for each new battle.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static BombingCombatManager getInstance()
      Returns the instance of BombingCombatManager.

    • getAirshipBattlefield

      public FightAirship[][] getAirshipBattlefield()
      Returns the matrix of the airships in the battlefield.

    • moveAvailableShipListToField

      public void moveAvailableShipListToField​(int indexShip, int position)
      Moves the selected airship from the reserves to the battlefield.
      The airship can only move to an empty place in the first field of the battlefield.
      Parameters:
      indexShip - the index of the airship in the list of available airships.
      position - the position in the first field to which the airship will move

    • retreatShip

      public void retreatShip​(FightAirship airship)
      Retreats the selected airship from the battlefield to the reserves.
      This action can only be performed if the airship is located in the first field of the battlefield.
      Parameters:
      airship - the selected airship to move

    • moveShip

      public void moveShip​(FightAirship airship, int field, int position)
      Moves an airship in the battlefield to an empty place.
      This action can only be performed if the selected place is less than 1 field away from the airship initial place.
      Parameters:
      airship - the airship to move
      field - the field to which the airship will move
      position - the position in the field to which the airship if moving

    • invertShip

      public void invertShip​(FightAirship airship1, FightAirship airship2)
      Inverts the position and field of two airships.
      This action can only happen if the two airships are separated at most by one field.
      Parameters:
      airship1 - the first airship to move
      airship2 - the second airship to move

    • getTurn

      public int getTurn()
      Returns the current turn of the battle.

    • nextTurn

      public void nextTurn()
      Computes the next turn.
      The methods notably checks if the airships can move and if their weapon can realise an action.

    • getWeaponToggleGroup

      public javafx.scene.control.ToggleGroup getWeaponToggleGroup()
      Returns the toggle group of the weapons' button.

    • setSelectedAllyShip

      public void setSelectedAllyShip​(FightAirship selectedAllyShip)
      Sets the selectedAllyShip property.
      Parameters:
      selectedAllyShip - the new selectedAllyShip

    • setSelectedEnemyShip

      public void setSelectedEnemyShip​(FightAirship selectedEnemyShip)
      Sets the selectedEnemyShip property.
      Parameters:
      selectedEnemyShip - the new selectedEnemyShip

    • getSelectedEnemyShip

      public FightAirship getSelectedEnemyShip()
      Returns the selected enemy airship.

    • getAirshipBattleButton

      public javafx.scene.control.RadioButton[][] getAirshipBattleButton()
      Returns the lst of the button of the airships' places.

    • music

      public void music()
      Load the file of the music and launch it. Once ended, the music restarts.
